channel.title: 2019 Elections on Hemanth Bharatha Chakravarthy
channel.description: Recent content in 2019 Elections on Hemanth Bharatha Chakravarthy

item.title: Chowkidar Campaign: What is the Twitter Sentiment?
item.description: Analysis of Twitter Reactions to the BJP’s #Chowkidar Campaign I analyzed a mixed sample of the most popular and most recent one hundred and eight thousand tweets in English from the last three days (as of 20 March, 2019, 10:07 pm EST) on the Bharatiya Janata Party’s #MainBhiChowkidar campaign. Sentiment Analysis: Were the Tweets Positive or Negative? Comparing the number of positive tweets against the number of negative tweets.
